Package au.csiro.pathling.async

Class AsyncAspect

java.lang.Object
au.csiro.pathling.async.AsyncAspect
@Component @Profile("server") @ConditionalOnProperty(prefix="pathling", name="async.enabled", havingValue="true") @Order(200) public class AsyncAspect extends Object
Intercepts calls to methods annotated with AsyncSupported to run them asynchronously, allowing the client to poll a job endpoint for progress and the final result.
Author:
John Grimes

    • AsyncAspect

      public AsyncAspect(@Nonnull org.springframework.scheduling.concurrent.ThreadPoolTaskExecutor executor, @Nonnull RequestTagFactory requestTagFactory, @Nonnull JobRegistry jobRegistry, @Nonnull StageMap stageMap, @Nonnull SparkSession spark)
      Parameters:
      executor - used to run asynchronous jobs in the background
      requestTagFactory - used to create RequestTag instances
      jobRegistry - the JobRegistry used to keep track of running jobs
      stageMap - the StageMap used to map stages to job IDs
      spark - used for updating the Spark Context with job identity
